author: sandygao
msg: Added derivedFrom() convenient methods to check whether this type is derived from another type.

author: sandygao
msg: 2. Schema rec issue R-75: max/minIn/Exclusive facet values should be from base, unless it has the same value as that of the same facet in the base.
3. Added derivedFrom() convenient methods to check whether this type is derived from another type.

author: sandygao
msg: Use error codes defined by the schema spec.

author: sandygao
msg: 1. Cleaned up how we traverse simple types;
2. Fixed problems: sometimes we didn't report errors in simple types;
3. Synchronize access to static member in XSComplexTypeDecl.
4. Use error codes defined by the schema spec.

author: sandygao
msg: Change the lexical representation of gMonth from --MM-- to --MM. This is an erratum of the schema spec.
